item.title: 中国曾经强大的信贷周期正在世界市场上逐渐消失
item.description: 中国的信贷引擎曾为全世界的工业和市场提供动力，但如今却陷入低速运转，并将继续如此。【原文：China’s credit engine, which once powered industries and markets all over the world, is stuck in low gear – and set to stay there.】

item.title: 禁令最后期限临近，韩国将讨论卖空规则调整问题
item.description: 韩国将于周四考虑修改其卖空规则，这也是正在进行的关于何时解除对这种交易策略的禁令的讨论的一部分。【原文：South Korea will consider changes to its short-selling rules Thursday as part of ongoing discussions on when to lift the ban on the trading strategy.】

item.title: 吉姆-查诺斯说，在 "欺诈的黄金时代 "很难筹集到现金
item.description: 从太阳能股票到数据中心，传奇投资人吉姆-查诺斯（Jim Chanos）认为做空者有很多机会。问题是：像他这样的看空基金经理仍在努力筹集资金。【原文：From solar stocks to data centers, legendary investor Jim Chanos sees plenty of opportunities for short sellers. The problem: Bearish money managers like him are still struggling to raise capital.】

item.title: Blackstone 在新债发行狂潮中搁置 13 亿美元商业抵押债券交易
item.description: 黑石集团（Blackstone Inc. ）出售 12.75 亿美元以商业房地产债务为支持的债券的计划现已搁置，而商业房地产债务的发行量仍在继续飙升。【原文：Blackstone Inc.’s plan to sell a $1.275 billion bond backed by commercial real estate debt is now on hold while issuance of the debt continues to soar.】

item.title: 墨西哥银行称若比索波动 "极端 "可介入
item.description: 墨西哥央行行长维多利亚-罗德里格斯（Victoria Rodriguez）说，如果货币市场波动变得 "极端"，墨西哥可能会进行干预，以恢复秩序。【原文：Mexico could intervene to restore order if currency market volatility ever becomes “extreme,” central bank Governor Victoria Rodriguez said.】

item.title: 墨西哥开始削减 2025 年外债偿付额的行动
item.description: 墨西哥财政部副部长加布里埃尔-约里奥（Gabriel Yorio）在一篇 X 帖子中写道，墨西哥已经启动了减少 2025 年到期债务的行动。【原文：Mexico has kicked off an operation to reduce 2025 debt maturities, Deputy Finance Minister Gabriel Yorio wrote in an X post.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长纳格尔称欧元区核心通胀 "仍非常坚挺
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）表示，欧元区的基本消费价格增长被证明是顽固的。【原文：The euro zone’s underlying consumer price growth is proving stubborn, according to European Central Bank Governing Council member Joachim Nagel.】

item.title: 美国大型银行为何抵制更大的 "资本缓冲"？
item.description: 美国监管机构去年夏天提出了新规定，要求银行增加数十亿美元的所谓资本缓冲，以便在经济下滑时提供保护。最大的银行将承受最沉重的负担，它们必须将资本水平提高约 19%。这些规定源于 2008 年的金融危机，是在 2023 年四家中型银行倒闭后不久出台的。【原文：US regulators proposed new rules last summer requiring banks to add billions of dollars to their so-called capital cushions, which offer protection during downturns. The heaviest burdens would fall on the biggest banks, which would have to boost their capital levels by about 19%. The rules stem from the 2008 financial crisis and came out soon after the 2023 collapse of four midsize banks.】

item.description: 在乔-拜登总统的政府推出一系列旨在进一步阻碍克里姆林宫乌克兰战争的措施后，俄罗斯的主要交易所表示将停止美元和欧元交易。【原文：Russia’s main exchange said it’s halting trading in US dollars and the euro after President Joe Biden’s administration unveiled a raft of measures designed to further impede the Kremlin’s war in Ukraine.】

item.title: 赞比亚终于完成美元债券改革，但违约标签依然存在
item.description: 赞比亚终于结束了近四年的美元债券违约，发行了两个系列的重组债券，这些债券都是紧张谈判的产物。【原文：Zambia has finally ended nearly four years of default on its dollar bonds, issuing two series of restructured notes that were the product of intense negotiations.】

item.title: 津巴布韦 ZiG 法案促使废除股票市场的归属规则
item.description: 津巴布韦新货币 ZiG 的稳定性促使当局废除了自 2022 年起实施的一项规定，该规定要求津巴布韦主要证券交易所的投资者持有股票 180 天，否则将面临缴纳更高的资本利得税的风险。【原文：The stability of Zimbabwe’s new currency, the ZiG, has prompted authorities to scrap a rule in place since 2022 that requires investors on its main bourse to hold onto stocks for a period of 180 days or risk paying a higher capital gains tax.】

item.title: 亿万富翁大亨卡洛斯-斯利姆的投资公司披露持有英国电信 3.2% 的股份
item.description: 亿万富翁卡洛斯-斯利姆（Carlos Slim）的家族投资公司披露持有英国电信公司英国电信集团（BT Group Plc）3.2%的股份，该公司新任首席执行官在过去一个月里扭转了股价下跌的趋势，并提高了股息。【原文：Billionaire Carlos Slim’s family investment firm has disclosed a 3.2% stake in UK telecommunications company BT Group Plc, whose new chief executive officer has reversed share declines and boosted the dividend in the past month.】

item.title: 特斯拉向欧盟施压，要求降低从中国运入的电动汽车关税
item.description: 特斯拉公司要求欧盟对其电动汽车征收低于其他从中国运入欧盟的汽车制造商的关税，理由是特斯拉受益于较少的国家支持。【原文：Tesla Inc. has asked the European Union to subject its electric vehicles to a lower tariff rate than other manufacturers shipping cars into the bloc from China, arguing that it’s benefitted from less substantial state support.】

item.title: 在 Elabe 选举民调中，马克龙党团的支持率为 18%，勒庞党团的支持率为 31
item.description: 周三公布的投票意向民意调查显示，玛丽娜-勒庞领导的极右翼政党国民联盟将以 31% 的支持率赢得法国立法选举第一轮投票，而埃马纽埃尔-马克龙领导的政党将以 18% 的支持率位居第三。【原文：The far-right National Rally party of Marine Le Pen would win the first round of the French legislative election with 31%, while President Emmanuel Macron’s party would come in third with 18%, according to a poll of voting intentions published on Wednesday.】

item.title: 斯蒂夫尔关闭卡尔加里办事处，裁减多伦多银行家职位

item.title: 壳牌将成为 Pavilion Energy LNG 资产的领跑者
item.description: 壳牌公司（Shell Plc）已成为收购贸易公司 Pavilion Energy Pte 资产的主要竞标者，这项交易将加强这家超级巨头的液化天然气业务。【原文：Shell Plc has emerged as the lead bidder to buy assets of trading firm Pavilion Energy Pte, in a deal that will bolster the supermajor’s liquefied natural gas activities.】

item.title: 卡特彼勒提高季度派息并加强股票回购计划
item.description: 卡特彼勒公司将其股息提高了约 8%，并在其股票回购计划中增加了 200 亿美元，因为该公司以生产标志性黄色重型机械而闻名的部门表现强劲。【原文：Caterpillar Inc. hiked its dividend by about 8% and added $20 billion to its share buyback program after seeing strong performance from its division best known for making iconic yellow heavy-duty machinery.】

item.title: 安哥拉就价值 35 亿美元的炼油厂向 Quanten 发出最后通牒
item.description: 安哥拉威胁称，如果无法筹集到项目资金，将终止与美国Quanten LLC集团的合同，该集团将在非洲国家建设一座耗资35亿美元的炼油厂。【原文：Angola has threatened to terminate a contract with U.S.-based group Quanten LLC to build a $3.5 billion oil refinery in the African country if it fails to raise the funds for the project.】

item.title: 法国保守党在领导人与极右翼势力达成协议后将其驱逐出境
